arts.ttl: Wolves vs Leeds United – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: The pressure is immense at Molineux as Wolves host Leeds United on Saturday, still searching for their first points of the Premier League season. A disastrous start has seen the club lose its opening four league games for the first time in its history, leaving Vítor Pereira’s side rooted to the bottom of the table. arts.ttl: Leeds United XI vs Wolves – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Daniel Farke takes his Leeds United side to Molineux on Saturday, aiming to end a worrying goal drought that has seen them fail to score in their last three Premier League games. arts.ttl: Wolves vs Leeds United – Match Preview and Team News
arts.sum: A crucial Premier League encounter takes place at Molineux on Saturday as two struggling sides, Wolves and Leeds United, clash in a vital match. The fixture pits a rock-bottom Wolves side, who have lost their opening four games for the first time in their history, against a Leeds team that has failed to score in […] The post Wolves vs Leeds United – Match Preview and Team News first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Alarming disciplinary record uncovered as Leeds United face Wolves
arts.sum: When I look to preview Leeds United’s trip to Wolves, it’s clear that anything remotely close to previous clashes would produce another feast. Leeds’ previous two seasons in the Premier League were rough for the most part. Finishing narrowly outside the bottom three in 21/22, Leeds then suffered relegation the following campaign in 22/23. arts.ttl: Wolves confirm major decision ahead of Leeds United clash
arts.sum: Leeds United travel to Molineux in a big clash against bottom-half rivals Wolves this weekend, with both managers facing pressure to get results. While we may only be four games into the season, Molineux is playing host to a very early six-pointer in the Premier League. Leeds travel to take on Wolves looking to bounce […] The post Wolves confirm major decision on manager ahead of Leeds United clash appeared first on LeedsAllOver.

arts.ttl: Wolves issue Jorgen Strand Larsen injury update after training ahead of Leeds United
arts.sum: Vitor Pereira has confirmed that Jorgen Strand Larsen has trained ahead of Wolves’ match against Leeds United. Jorgen Strand Larsen has been out of action since Wolves’ Carabao Cup clash against West Ham, and Vitor Pereira has provided another update on the Norwegian.

arts.ttl: Wolves receive injury boost ahead of Leeds clash
arts.sum: But on the eve of the club's huge match at Molineux against Leeds, head coach Vitor Pereira has now confirmed the Norwegian will be back in action. Larsen has also now agreed a new five year contract, with a year option, in a move that was welcomed by the head coach.

arts.ttl: Wolves, West Ham, Burnley, Leeds, Forest - why Saturday's fixtures really matter
arts.sum: Wolves, West Ham, Burnley, Leeds and Nottingham Forest have all, to varying degrees, made a fairly wretched start to the new Premier League campaign. So, we ask the question, why does this weekend matter so much for each club? Sky Sports' reporters have their say...

arts.ttl: November Premier League fixtures shift for TV coverage, UEFA duties, and midweek drama
arts.sum: Key kick-offs move for Sky and TNT Sports broadcasts, with clubs like Villa, Palace, and Forest rescheduled due to Europa ties. Updated match times keep fans tuned in all month.

arts.ttl: Key player set to make return for Leeds vs Wolves clash – Sources
arts.sum: Daniel Farke will be hoping for a huge response from his Leeds United side after the last time out against Fulham. The Whites lost the game in the dying minutes due to an unfortunate error.
